REPEL.name: Repel
REPEL.description: An item that prevents wild Pokémon from appearing for 100 steps after its use.

STINKBOMB.name: Stink Bomb
STINKBOMB.description: Rare contraband. Any average solo trainer will flee from the stench of its explosion.

FIRESTONE.name: Fire Stone
FIRESTONE.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is colored orange.

THUNDERSTONE.name: Thunder Stone
THUNDERSTONE.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It has a thunderbolt pattern.

WATERSTONE.name: Water Stone
WATERSTONE.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is a clear, light blue.

LEAFSTONE.name: Leaf Stone
LEAFSTONE.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It has a leaf pattern.

MOONSTONE.name: Moon Stone
MOONSTONE.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is as black as the night sky.

SUNSTONE.name: Sun Stone
SUNSTONE.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is as red as the sun.

DUSKSTONE.name: Dusk Stone
DUSKSTONE.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is as dark as dark can be.

DAWNSTONE.name: Dawn Stone
DAWNSTONE.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It sparkles like eyes.

SHINYSTONE.name: Shiny Stone
SHINYSTONE.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It shines with a dazzling light.

ICESTONE.name: Ice Stone
ICESTONE.description: A peculiar stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It has a snowflake pattern.

PRISMSTONE.name: Prism Stone
PRISMSTONE.description: A many-colored stone that makes a lot of Pokémon evolve. Can be used in place of any evolution stone.

DIAMONDTIARA.name: Diamond Tiara
DIAMONDTIARA.description: A glimmering tiara made of diamonds. It makes a certain Pokémon evolve.

KNIGHTHELMET.name: Knight Helmet
KNIGHTHELMET.description: A shining helmet. It makes a certain Pokémon evolve.

NINJASCARF.name: Ninja Scarf
NINJASCARF.description: A cool scarf. It makes a certain Pokémon evolve.

ALOLANWREATH.name: Alolan Wreath
ALOLANWREATH.description: A beautiful floral wreath from Alola that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve.

GALARICAWREATH.name: Galarica Wreath
GALARICAWREATH.description: A wreath made from woven Galarica Twigs. It makes certain species of Pokémon evolve.

SWEETAPPLE.name: Sweet Apple
SWEETAPPLE.description: A peculiar apple that can make a certain species of Pokémon evolve. It's exceptionally sweet.

TARTAPPLE.name: Tart Apple
TARTAPPLE.description: A peculiar apple that can make a certain species of Pokémon evolve. It's exceptionally tart.

HELIXFOSSIL.name: Helix Fossil
HELIXFOSSIL.description: A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that lived in the sea. It appears to be part of a seashell.

DOMEFOSSIL.name: Dome Fossil
DOMEFOSSIL.description: A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that lived in the sea. It appears to be part of a shell.

OLDAMBER.name: Old Amber
OLDAMBER.description: A piece of amber that contains the genes of an ancient Pokémon. It is clear with a reddish tint.

ROOTFOSSIL.name: Root Fossil
ROOTFOSSIL.description: A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that lived in the sea. It appears to be part of a plant root.

CLAWFOSSIL.name: Claw Fossil
CLAWFOSSIL.description: A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that lived in the sea. It appears to be part of a claw.

SKULLFOSSIL.name: Skull Fossil
SKULLFOSSIL.description: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that lived on the land. It appears to be part of a head.

ARMORFOSSIL.name: Armor Fossil
ARMORFOSSIL.description: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that lived on the land. It appears to be part of a collar.

COVERFOSSIL.name: Cover Fossil
COVERFOSSIL.description: A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that lived in the sea in ancient times. It appears to be part of its back.

PLUMEFOSSIL.name: Plume Fossil
PLUMEFOSSIL.description: A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that flew in the sky in ancient times. It appears to be part of its wing.

JAWFOSSIL.name: Jaw Fossil
JAWFOSSIL.description: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived on the land. It appears to be part of a large jaw.

SAILFOSSIL.name: Sail Fossil
SAILFOSSIL.description: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived on the land. It looks like the impression from a skin sail.

HONEY.name: Honey
HONEY.description: A sweet honey with a sweeter aroma. It can be sold to shops for $750.

PRETTYFEATHER.name: Pretty Feather
PRETTYFEATHER.description: A beautiful feather. It can be sold to shops for $1500.

TINYMUSHROOM.name: Tiny Mushroom
TINYMUSHROOM.description: A small and rare mushroom. It can be sold to shops for $250.

BIGMUSHROOM.name: Big Mushroom
BIGMUSHROOM.description: A large and rare mushroom. It can be sold to shops for $2500.

BALMMUSHROOM.name: Balm Mushroom
BALMMUSHROOM.description: A rare mushroom which gives off a nice fragrance. It can be sold to shops for $7500.

PEARL.name: Pearl
PEARL.description: A somewhat-small pearl that sparkles in a pretty silver color. It can be sold to shops for $1000.

BIGPEARL.name: Big Pearl
BIGPEARL.description: A quite-large pearl that sparkles in a pretty silver color. It can be sold to shops for $4000.

PEARLSTRING.name: Pearl String
PEARLSTRING.description: Very large pearls that sparkle in a pretty silver color. It can be sold to shops for $10000.

STARDUST.name: Stardust
STARDUST.description: Lovely, red-colored sand with a loose, silky feel. It can be sold to shops for $1500.

STARPIECE.name: Star Piece
STARPIECE.description: A shard of a pretty gem that sparkles in a red color. It can be sold to shops for $6000.

COMETSHARD.name: Comet Shard
COMETSHARD.description: A shard which fell to the ground when a comet approached. It can be sold to shops for $12500.

NUGGET.name: Gold Nugget
NUGGET.description: A nugget of pure gold that gives off a lustrous gleam. It can be sold to shops for $5000.

BIGNUGGET.name: Big Nugget
BIGNUGGET.description: A big nugget of pure gold that gives off a lustrous gleam. It can be sold to shops for $20000.

SLOWPOKETAIL.name: Slowpoke Tail
SLOWPOKETAIL.description: A very tasty tail of something. It can be sold to shops for $4000.

RAREBONE.name: Rare Bone
RAREBONE.description: A bone that is extremely valuable for Pokémon archaeology. It can be sold to shops for $2500.

RELICCOPPER.name: Relic Copper
RELICCOPPER.description: A copper coin used in a civilization about 3,000 years ago. It can be sold to shops for $1000.

RELICSILVER.name: Relic Silver
RELICSILVER.description: A silver coin used in a civilization about 3,000 years ago. It can be sold to shops for $5000.

RELICGOLD.name: Relic Gold
RELICGOLD.description: A gold coin used in a civilization about 3,000 years ago. It can be sold to shops for $10,000.

RELICVASE.name: Relic Vase
RELICVASE.description: A vase made in a civilization about 3,000 years ago. It can be sold to shops for $30,000.

RELICBAND.name: Relic Band
RELICBAND.description: A bracelet made in a civilization about 3,000 years ago. It can be sold to shops for $80,000.

RELICSTATUE.name: Relic Statue
RELICSTATUE.description: A stone figure made in a civilization about 3,000 years ago. Can be sold for $150,000.

RELICCROWN.name: Relic Crown
RELICCROWN.description: A crown made in a civilization about 3,000 years ago. Can be sold for $300,000.

AIRBALLOON.name: Air Balloon
AIRBALLOON.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder will float in the air until hit. Once hit, this item will burst.

EVIOLITE.name: Eviolite
EVIOLITE.description: When held by a Pokémon who can still evolve, reduces move damage taken by 33%. Prevents evolution.

POWERLOCK.name: Power Lock
POWERLOCK.description: A held item. In battles, it sets the holder's base Attack stat to 120.

ENERGYLOCK.name: Energy Lock
ENERGYLOCK.description: A held item. In battles, it sets the holder's base Sp. Atk stat to 120.

FLOATSTONE.name: Float Stone
FLOATSTONE.description: A very light stone. It reduces the weight of a Pokémon when held.

ASSAULTVEST.name: Assault Vest
ASSAULTVEST.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It raises Sp. Def by 50% but prevents the use of status moves.

STRIKEVEST.name: Strike Vest
STRIKEVEST.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It raises Defense by 50% but prevents the use of status moves.

WEAKNESSPOLICY.name: Weakness Policy
WEAKNESSPOLICY.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. Its Attack and Sp. Atk raise by four steps if hit by a move it's weak to.

ADRENALINEORB.name: Adrenaline Orb
ADRENALINEORB.description: When held, it boosts Speed by two steps when intimidated, fascinated, or frustrated once per battle.

ROCKYHELMET.name: Rocky Helmet
ROCKYHELMET.description: Damages attackers for 1/6th of their HP when they hit the holder with physical attacks.

HIVISJACKET.name: Hi-Viz Jacket
HIVISJACKET.description: Damages attackers for 1/6th of their HP when they hit the holder with special attacks.

EJECTBUTTON.name: Eject Button
EJECTBUTTON.description: If the holder is hit by an attack, it will switch with another Pokémon in your party.

REDCARD.name: Red Card
REDCARD.description: A card with a mysterious power. When the holder is struck by a foe, the attacker is removed from battle.

SHEDSHELL.name: Shed Shell
SHEDSHELL.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This discarded carapace lets the holder switch out of battle without fail.

SMOKEBALL.name: Smoke Ball
SMOKEBALL.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It enables the holder to flee from any wild Pokémon without fail.

LUCKYEGG.name: Lucky Egg
LUCKYEGG.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is an egg filled with happiness that earns extra Exp. Points in battle.

AMULETCOIN.name: Amulet Coin
AMULETCOIN.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It doubles a battle's prize money if the holding Pokémon joins in.

SOOTHEBELL.name: Soothe Bell
SOOTHEBELL.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The comforting chime of this bell makes it gain happiness twice as fast.

CLEANSETAG.name: Cleanse Tag
CLEANSETAG.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It prevents wild Pokémon encounters if the holder is the first one in the party.

CHOICEBAND.name: Choice Band
CHOICEBAND.description: Held item which ups Attack by 40%, but allows the use of only one move.

CHOICESPECS.name: Choice Specs
CHOICESPECS.description: Held item which ups Sp. Atk by 40%, but allows the use of only one move.

CHOICESCARF.name: Choice Scarf
CHOICESCARF.description: Held item which boosts Speed by 40% but allows the use of only one move.

LUMBERAXE.name: Lumber Axe
LUMBERAXE.description: Held item which boosts move damage by 25%, but lowers the user's Speed by 15%.

HEATROCK.name: Heat Rock
HEATROCK.description: A Pokémon held item. When the holder summons sunshine, it lasts twice as long.

DAMPROCK.name: Damp Rock
DAMPROCK.description: A Pokémon held item. When the holder summons rainstorm, it lasts twice as long.

SMOOTHROCK.name: Smooth Rock
SMOOTHROCK.description: A Pokémon held item. When the holder summons a sandstorm, it lasts twice as long.

ICYROCK.name: Icy Rock
ICYROCK.description: A Pokémon held item. When the holder summons hail, it lasts twice as long.

PINPOINTROCK.name: Pin-Point Rock
PINPOINTROCK.description: A Pokémon held item. When the holder summons eclipse, it lasts twice as long.

MIRROREDROCK.name: Mirrored Rock
MIRROREDROCK.description: A Pokémon held item. When the holder summons moonglow, it lasts twice as long.

LIGHTCLAY.name: Light Clay
LIGHTCLAY.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. Protective screens will be effective for 3 more turns.

REINFORCINGROD.name: Reinforcing Rod
REINFORCINGROD.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It doubles the duration of Rooms created by the holder.

GRIPCLAW.name: Grip Claw
GRIPCLAW.description: A Pokémon held item that doubles the duration of multiturn trapping attacks.

BINDINGBAND.name: Binding Band
BINDINGBAND.description: A band that doubles the damage dealt each turn by binding moves when held.

LOADEDDICE.name: Loaded Dice
LOADEDDICE.description: A held item. It makes multi-hit attacks consistently hit 4 or 5 times.

FRAGILELOCKET.name: Fragile Locket
FRAGILELOCKET.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The user gets both of its legal abilities, but its stats are cut by 10%.

BIGROOT.name: Big Root
BIGROOT.description: A held item. The holder recovers 30% more HP from draining moves, Ingrain, Aqua Ring, and leech.

BLACKSLUDGE.name: Black Sludge
BLACKSLUDGE.description: A held item that gradually restores the HP of Poison-type Pokémon. It inflicts damage on all other types.

LEFTOVERS.name: Leftovers
LEFTOVERS.description: A held item. The holder's HP is restored by 1/16th at the end of each turn.

SHELLBELL.name: Shell Bell
SHELLBELL.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder restores 1/5th HP of the damage it deals with moves.

WATERBALLOON.name: Water Balloon
WATERBALLOON.description: A held item. At half health, the holder breaks the balloon and gains an Aqua Ring.

MENTALHERB.name: Mental Herb
MENTALHERB.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It snaps the holder out of a variety of mental warping effects.

WHITEHERB.name: White Herb
WHITEHERB.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It restores any lowered stat in battle.

BLACKHERB.name: Black Herb
BLACKHERB.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. Lowered stats on the holder are also applied to foes.

AGILITYHERB.name: Agility Herb
AGILITYHERB.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. Doubles the Speed of the holder's move once per battle.

STRENGTHHERB.name: Strength Herb
STRENGTHHERB.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. Boosts the power of a physical move by 33% once per battle.

INTELLECTHERB.name: Intellect Herb
INTELLECTHERB.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. Boosts the power of a special move by 33% once per battle.

POWERHERB.name: Power Herb
POWERHERB.description: A single-use item to be held by a Pokémon. It allows the immediate use of a move that charges up first.

ENERGYHERB.name: Energy Herb
ENERGYHERB.description: A single-use item to be held by a Pokémon. It allows user to skip the recharging turn of an exhausting move.

MIRRORHERB.name: Mirror Herb
MIRRORHERB.description: A held item. When a foe raises their stats, the herb is consumed to copy the increase.

PARADOXHERB.name: Paradox Herb
PARADOXHERB.description: A held item. When a foe raises their stats, the herb is consumed to reset their stats.

LUCKHERB.name: Luck Herb
LUCKHERB.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. Ensures a random additional affect activates once per battle.

SKILLHERB.name: Skill Herb
SKILLHERB.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. Ensures a less than full accuracy move lands once per battle.

LIFEORB.name: Life Orb
LIFEORB.description: A held item. It boosts the power of moves by 30%, but at the cost of 10% HP on each hit.

EXPERTBELT.name: Expert Belt
EXPERTBELT.description: A well-worn belt that boosts the holder's supereffective moves by 20%.

METRONOME.name: Metronome
METRONOME.description: A held item. Boosts a move used consecutively by 20% more each time. This resets if another move is used.

MUSCLEBAND.name: Muscle Band
MUSCLEBAND.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a headband that boosts the power of physical moves by 10%.

WISEGLASSES.name: Wise Glasses
WISEGLASSES.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a thick pair of glasses that boosts the power of special moves by 10%.

SEVENLEAGUEBOOTS.name: 7-League Boots
SEVENLEAGUEBOOTS.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. They are boots that boost Speed by 10%.

SCOPELENS.name: Scope Lens
SCOPELENS.description: A held item. Doubles the holder's critical-hit chance.

WIDELENS.name: Wide Lens
WIDELENS.description: A held item. It is a magnifying lens that boosts the Accuracy of moves by 35%.

LAGGINGTAIL.name: Lagging Tail
LAGGINGTAIL.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is tremendously heavy and makes the holder move slower than usual.

FOCUSSASH.name: Focus Sash
FOCUSSASH.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If it has full HP, the holder will endure one potential KO attack, leaving 1 HP.

FLAMEORB.name: Flame Orb
FLAMEORB.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. A bizarre orb that inflicts burn on the holder at the end of a turn.

FROSTORB.name: Frost Orb
FROSTORB.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. A bizarre orb that inflicts frostbite on the holder at the end of a turn.

POISONORB.name: Poison Orb
POISONORB.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. A bizarre orb that inflicts poison on the holder at the end of a turn.

STICKYBARB.name: Sticky Barb
STICKYBARB.description: A held item that damages the holder on every turn. It may latch on to Pokémon that attacks the holder.

EJECTPACK.name: Eject Pack
EJECTPACK.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. When the holder's stats are lowered, it will be switched out of battle.

HEAVYDUTYBOOTS.name: Heavy-Duty Boots
HEAVYDUTYBOOTS.description: These boots prevent the effects of traps set on the battlefield.

THROATSPRAY.name: Throat Spray
THROATSPRAY.description: Raises Sp. Atk by two steps when the Pokémon uses a sound move the first time each battle.

WHETSTONE.name: Whetstone
WHETSTONE.description: Raises Attack by two steps when the Pokémon uses a blade move the first time each battle.

UTILITYUMBRELLA.name: Utility Umbrella
UTILITYUMBRELLA.description: A held item. The holder is protected from the negative effects of weather.

CRYSTALVEIL.name: Crystal Veil
CRYSTALVEIL.description: A held item. It changes the holder's type in battle. You can change which type between battles.

MEMORYSET.name: Memory Set
MEMORYSET.description: A set of memory discs, one for each type. If held by a Silvally, you can change its type between battles.

PRISMATICPLATE.name: Prismatic Plate
PRISMATICPLATE.description: A tablet that boosts same-type attacks by 20%. If held by Arceus, you can change its type between battles.

WILDCARD.name: Wild Card
WILDCARD.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It counts as a member of every tribe.

PROXYFIST.name: Proxy Fist
PROXYFIST.description: A held item. The holder doesn't trigger items, abilities, or effects of targets it hits.

COVERTCLOAK.name: Covert Cloak
COVERTCLOAK.description: A held item. The holder is protected from the random added effects and takes 10% less move damage.

COURAGEBADGE.name: Courage Badge
COURAGEBADGE.description: A held item. The holder is protected from flinching.

CLEARAMULET.name: Clear Amulet
CLEARAMULET.description: A held item. The holder is protected from stat drops (except when self-inflicted).

ADAMANTORB.name: Adamant Orb
ADAMANTORB.description: A brightly gleaming orb to be held by Dialga. It boosts the power of Dragon- and Steel-type moves.

LUSTROUSORB.name: Lustrous Orb
LUSTROUSORB.description: A beautifully glowing orb to be held by Palkia. It boosts the power of Dragon- and Water-type moves.

GRISEOUSORB.name: Griseous Orb
GRISEOUSORB.description: A glowing orb to be held by Giratina. It boosts the power of Dragon- and Ghost-type moves.

DOUSEDRIVE.name: Douse Drive
DOUSEDRIVE.description: A cassette to be held by Genesect. It changes Techno Blast to a Water-type move.

SHOCKDRIVE.name: Shock Drive
SHOCKDRIVE.description: A cassette to be held by Genesect. It changes Techno Blast to an Electric-type move.

BURNDRIVE.name: Burn Drive
BURNDRIVE.description: A cassette to be held by Genesect. It changes Techno Blast to a Fire-type move.

CHILLDRIVE.name: Chill Drive
CHILLDRIVE.description: A cassette to be held by Genesect. It changes Techno Blast to an Ice-type move.

EVERSTONE.name: Everstone
EVERSTONE.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The Pokémon holding this peculiar stone is prevented from evolving.

IRONBALL.name: Iron Ball
IRONBALL.description: A Pokémon held item that cuts Speed. It makes Flying-type and levitating holders susceptible to Ground moves.

CHARCOAL.name: Charcoal
CHARCOAL.description: A combustible fuel that boosts the holder's Fire-type moves by 20%.

MYSTICWATER.name: Mystic Water
MYSTICWATER.description: A teardrop-shaped gem that boosts the holder's Water-type moves by 20%.

MAGNET.name: Magnet
MAGNET.description: A powerful magnet that boosts the holder's Electric-type moves by 20%.

MIRACLESEED.name: Miracle Seed
MIRACLESEED.description: A seed imbued with life that boosts the holder's Grass-type moves by 20%.

NEVERMELTICE.name: Never-Melt Ice
NEVERMELTICE.description: A piece of ice that repels heat and boosts Ice-type moves by 20%.

BLACKBELT.name: Black Belt
BLACKBELT.description: A belt that boosts determination and Fighting-type moves by 20%.

POISONBARB.name: Poison Barb
POISONBARB.description: A small, poisonous barb that boosts the holder's Poison-type moves by 20%.

SOFTSAND.name: Soft Sand
SOFTSAND.description: A loose, silky sand that boosts the holder's Ground-type moves by 20%.

SHARPBEAK.name: Sharp Beak
SHARPBEAK.description: A long, sharp beak that boosts the holder's Flying-type moves by 20%.

TWISTEDSPOON.name: Twisted Spoon
TWISTEDSPOON.description: A spoon imbued with telekinetic power that boosts Psychic-type moves by 20%.

SILVERPOWDER.name: Silver Powder
SILVERPOWDER.description: A shiny, silver powder that boosts the holder's Bug-type moves by 20%.

HARDSTONE.name: Hard Stone
HARDSTONE.description: An unbreakable stone that boosts the holder's Rock-type moves by 20%.

SPELLTAG.name: Spell Tag
SPELLTAG.description: A sinister, eerie tag that boosts the holder's Ghost-type moves by 20%.

DRAGONFANG.name: Dragon Fang
DRAGONFANG.description: A hard and sharp fang that boosts the holder's Dragon-type moves by 20%.

BLACKGLASSES.name: Black Glasses
BLACKGLASSES.description: A shady-looking pair of glasses that boosts the holder's Dark-type moves by 20%.

METALCOAT.name: Metal Coat
METALCOAT.description: A special metallic film that boosts the holder's Steel-type moves by 20%.

SILKSCARF.name: Silk Scarf
SILKSCARF.description: A sumptuous scarf that boosts the holder's Normal-type moves by 20%.

FAIRYFEATHER.name: Fairy Feather
FAIRYFEATHER.description: A gleaming feather that boosts the holder's Fairy-type moves by 20%.

FIREGEM.name: Fire Gem
FIREGEM.description: A gem with an essence of fire. Boosts the power of a Fire-type move by 50% once per battle.

WATERGEM.name: Water Gem
WATERGEM.description: A gem with an essence of water. Boosts the power of a Water-type move by 50% once per battle.

ELECTRICGEM.name: Electric Gem
ELECTRICGEM.description: A gem with an essence of electricity. Boosts the power of an Electric-type move by 50% once per battle.

GRASSGEM.name: Grass Gem
GRASSGEM.description: A gem with an essence of nature. Boosts the power of a Grass-type move by 50% once per battle.

ICEGEM.name: Ice Gem
ICEGEM.description: A gem with an essence of ice. Boosts the power of an Ice-type move by 50% once per battle.

FIGHTINGGEM.name: Fighting Gem
FIGHTINGGEM.description: A gem with an essence of combat. Boosts the power of a Fighting-type move by 50% once per battle.

POISONGEM.name: Poison Gem
POISONGEM.description: A gem with an essence of poison. Boosts the power of a Poison-type move by 50% once per battle.

GROUNDGEM.name: Ground Gem
GROUNDGEM.description: A gem with an essence of land. Boosts the power of a Ground-type move by 50% once per battle.

FLYINGGEM.name: Flying Gem
FLYINGGEM.description: A gem with an essence of air. Boosts the power of a Flying-type move by 50% once per battle.

PSYCHICGEM.name: Psychic Gem
PSYCHICGEM.description: A gem with an essence of the mind. Boosts the power of a Psychic-type move by 50% once per battle.

BUGGEM.name: Bug Gem
BUGGEM.description: A gem with an insect-like essence. Boosts the power of a Bug-type move by 50% once per battle.

ROCKGEM.name: Rock Gem
ROCKGEM.description: A gem with an essence of rock. Boosts the power of a Rock-type move by 50% once per battle.

GHOSTGEM.name: Ghost Gem
GHOSTGEM.description: A gem with a spectral essence. Boosts the power of a Ghost-type move by 50% once per battle.

DRAGONGEM.name: Dragon Gem
DRAGONGEM.description: A gem with a draconic essence. Boosts the power of a Dragon-type move by 50% once per battle.

DARKGEM.name: Dark Gem
DARKGEM.description: A gem with an essence of darkness. Boosts the power of a Dark-type move by 50% once per battle.

STEELGEM.name: Steel Gem
STEELGEM.description: A gem with an essence of steel. Boosts the power of a Steel-type move by 50% once per battle.

NORMALGEM.name: Normal Gem
NORMALGEM.description: A gem with an ordinary essence. Boosts the power of a Normal-type move by 50% once per battle.

FAIRYGEM.name: Fairy Gem
FAIRYGEM.description: A gem with an essence of the fey. Boosts the power of a Fairy-type move by 50% once per battle.

POTION.name: Potion
POTION.description: A spray-type medicine for wounds. It restores the HP of one Pokémon, fainted or able, by 40 points.

SUPERPOTION.name: Super Potion
SUPERPOTION.description: A spray-type medicine for wounds. It restores the HP of one Pokémon, fainted or able, by 80 points.

HYPERPOTION.name: Hyper Potion
HYPERPOTION.description: A spray-type medicine for wounds. It restores the HP of one Pokémon, fainted or able, by 120 points.

MAXPOTION.name: Max Potion
MAXPOTION.description: A spray-type medicine for wounds. It completely restores the HP of a single Pokémon, fainted or able.

FULLRESTORE.name: Full Restore
FULLRESTORE.description: A medicine that fully restores the HP and heals any status problems of a single Pokémon, fainted or able.

SACREDASH.name: Sacred Ash
SACREDASH.description: It revives all fainted Pokémon. In doing so, it also fully restores their HP.

LAVACOOKIE.name: Lava Cookie
LAVACOOKIE.description: Lavaridge Town's local specialty. It heals all the status problems of one Pokémon.

OLDGATEAU.name: Old Gateau
OLDGATEAU.description: Old Chateau's hidden specialty. It heals all the status problems of a single Pokémon.

CASTELIACONE.name: Casteliacone
CASTELIACONE.description: Castelia City's specialty, soft-serve ice cream. It heals all the status problems of a single Pokémon.

BERRYJUICE.name: Berry Juice
BERRYJUICE.description: A 100% pure juice made of Berries. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by just 20 points.

RAGECANDYBAR.name: Rage Candy Bar
RAGECANDYBAR.description: Mahogany Town's famous candy. It can be used once to heal all the status conditions of a Pokémon.

SWEETHEART.name: Sweet Heart
SWEETHEART.description: Very sweet chocolate. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 40 points and makes it happier.

FRESHWATER.name: Fresh Water
FRESHWATER.description: Water with a high mineral content. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 50 points.

SODAPOP.name: Soda Pop
SODAPOP.description: A fizzy soda drink. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 100 points.

LEMONADE.name: Lemonade
LEMONADE.description: A very sweet drink. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 150 points.

MOOMOOMILK.name: Moomoo Milk
MOOMOOMILK.description: Nutritious milk. It fully restores the HP and heals any status problems of a single Pokémon.

RARECANDY.name: Rare Candy
RARECANDY.description: A candy that is packed with energy. It raises the level of a single Pokémon by one.

VANILLATULUMBA.name: Vanilla Tulumba
VANILLATULUMBA.description: Fried dough dipped in vanilla syrup. Heals a single Pokémon by 100 HP, and grants it 4000 Experience points.

MASTERBALL.name: Master Ball
MASTERBALL.description: The best Ball with the ultimate level of performance. It will catch any wild Pokémon without fail.

RADIANTBALL.name: Radiant Ball
RADIANTBALL.description: A ball with a mythical quality. It will catch any wild Pokémon without fail, and turn that Pokémon shiny.

ULTRABALL.name: Ultra Ball
ULTRABALL.description: An ultra-performance Ball with 2x the strength of a regular ball.

GREATBALL.name: Great Ball
GREATBALL.description: A good, high-performance Ball with 1.5x strength compared to a regular ball.

POKEBALL.name: Poké Ball
POKEBALL.description: A device for catching wild Pokémon. It is thrown like a ball at the target. It is designed as a capsule system.

SAFARIBALL.name: Safari Ball
SAFARIBALL.description: A special Poké Ball that is used only in the Safari Zone. It is decorated in a camouflage pattern.

SPORTBALL.name: Sport Ball
SPORTBALL.description: A special Poké Ball for the Bug-Catching Contest.

NESTBALL.name: Nest Ball
NESTBALL.description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that works better the lower the Pokémon's level is below your level cap.

REPEATBALL.name: Repeat Ball
REPEATBALL.description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that works at 3.5x strength on Pokémon species that were previously caught.

TIMERBALL.name: Timer Ball
TIMERBALL.description: A somewhat different Ball that becomes up to 4x better the more turns there are in a battle.

LUXURYBALL.name: Luxury Ball
LUXURYBALL.description: A comfortable Poké Ball that makes a caught wild Pokémon gain happiness twice as quickly.

PREMIERBALL.name: Premier Ball
PREMIERBALL.description: A somewhat rare Poké Ball that has been specially made to commemorate an event of some sort.

HEALBALL.name: Heal Ball
HEALBALL.description: A remedial Poké Ball that restores the caught Pokémon's HP and eliminates any status problem.

QUICKBALL.name: Quick Ball
QUICKBALL.description: A somewhat different Poké Ball which has 5x strength on the first turn of a wild encounter.

CHERISHBALL.name: Cherish Ball
CHERISHBALL.description: A quite rare Poké Ball that has been specially crafted to commemorate an occasion of some sort.

FRIENDBALL.name: Friend Ball
FRIENDBALL.description: A Poké Ball that makes caught Pokémon more friendly.

DREAMBALL.name: Dream Ball
DREAMBALL.description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that makes it easier to catch wild Pokémon while they're asleep.

BEASTBALL.name: Beast Ball
BEASTBALL.description: A special Poké Ball designed to catch Ultra Beasts. It has a low success rate for catching others.

SLICEBALL.name: Slice Ball
SLICEBALL.description: A sharp Poké Ball that damages the Pokémon for 1/4th of its HP if it fails to catch it.

LEECHBALL.name: Leech Ball
LEECHBALL.description: A parasitic Poké Ball that leeches the Pokémon if it fails to catch it.

POTIONBALL.name: Potion Ball
POTIONBALL.description: A medicinal Poké Ball that heals the Pokémon for 1/4th of its HP if it fails to catch it.

DISABLEBALL.name: Disable Ball
DISABLEBALL.description: A mentally disrupting Poké Ball that disables the Pokémon's last used move for 10 turns if it fails to catch it.

ROYALBALL.name: Royal Ball
ROYALBALL.description: A ball whose striking appearance makes it popular despite its poor performance.

CHERIBERRY.name: Cheri Berry
CHERIBERRY.description: It may be held by a Pokémon to recover from numbing.

CHESTOBERRY.name: Chesto Berry
CHESTOBERRY.description: It may be held by a Pokémon to recover from sleep.

PECHABERRY.name: Pecha Berry
PECHABERRY.description: It may be held by a Pokémon to recover from poison.

RAWSTBERRY.name: Rawst Berry
RAWSTBERRY.description: It may be held by a Pokémon to recover from a burn.

ASPEARBERRY.name: Aspear Berry
ASPEARBERRY.description: It may be held by a Pokémon to recover from a frostbite.

PERSIMBERRY.name: Persim Berry
PERSIMBERRY.description: It may be held by a Pokémon to recover from being dizzy.

SPELONBERRY.name: Spelon Berry
SPELONBERRY.description: It may be held by a Pokémon to recover from being leeched.

BELUEBERRY.name: Belue Berry
BELUEBERRY.description: It may be held by a Pokémon to recover from being waterlogged.

LEPPABERRY.name: Leppa Berry
LEPPABERRY.description: It may be held by a Pokémon to restore a move's PP by 10.

LUMBERRY.name: Lum Berry
LUMBERRY.description: It may be held by a Pokémon to recover from any status problem.

SITRUSBERRY.name: Sitrus Berry
SITRUSBERRY.description: If held by a Pokémon, it heals its HP by 25% at half health.

CADOBERRY.name: Cado Berry
CADOBERRY.description: It may be held by a Pokémon to heal the user by 33% in a pinch (below 25% HP).

OCCABERRY.name: Occa Berry
OCCABERRY.description: Weakens a supereffective Fire-type attack against the holding Pokémon.

PASSHOBERRY.name: Passho Berry
PASSHOBERRY.description: Weakens a supereffective Water-type attack against the holding Pokémon.

WACANBERRY.name: Wacan Berry
WACANBERRY.description: Weakens a supereffective Electric-type attack against the holding Pokémon.

RINDOBERRY.name: Rindo Berry
RINDOBERRY.description: Weakens a supereffective Grass-type attack against the holding Pokémon.

YACHEBERRY.name: Yache Berry
YACHEBERRY.description: Weakens a supereffective Ice-type attack against the holding Pokémon.

CHOPLEBERRY.name: Chople Berry
CHOPLEBERRY.description: Weakens a supereffective Fighting-type attack against the holding Pokémon.

KEBIABERRY.name: Kebia Berry
KEBIABERRY.description: Weakens a supereffective Poison-type attack against the holding Pokémon.

SHUCABERRY.name: Shuca Berry
SHUCABERRY.description: Weakens a supereffective Ground-type attack against the holding Pokémon.

COBABERRY.name: Coba Berry
COBABERRY.description: Weakens a supereffective Flying-type attack against the holding Pokémon.

PAYAPABERRY.name: Payapa Berry
PAYAPABERRY.description: Weakens a supereffective Psychic-type attack against the holding Pokémon.

TANGABERRY.name: Tanga Berry
TANGABERRY.description: Weakens a supereffective Bug-type attack against the holding Pokémon.

CHARTIBERRY.name: Charti Berry
CHARTIBERRY.description: Weakens a supereffective Rock-type attack against the holding Pokémon.

KASIBBERRY.name: Kasib Berry
KASIBBERRY.description: Weakens a supereffective Ghost-type attack against the holding Pokémon.

HABANBERRY.name: Haban Berry
HABANBERRY.description: Weakens a supereffective Dragon-type attack against the holding Pokémon.

COLBURBERRY.name: Colbur Berry
COLBURBERRY.description: Weakens a supereffective Dark-type attack against the holding Pokémon.

BABIRIBERRY.name: Babiri Berry
BABIRIBERRY.description: Weakens a supereffective Steel-type attack against the holding Pokémon.

ROSELIBERRY.name: Roseli Berry
ROSELIBERRY.description: Weakens a supereffective Fairy-type attack against the holding Pokémon.

CHILANBERRY.name: Chilan Berry
CHILANBERRY.description: Weakens a Normal-type attack against the holding Pokémon.

LIECHIBERRY.name: Liechi Berry
LIECHIBERRY.description: If held by a Pokémon, it raises its Attack by two steps in a pinch.

GANLONBERRY.name: Ganlon Berry
GANLONBERRY.description: If held by a Pokémon, it raises its Defense by two steps in a pinch.

SALACBERRY.name: Salac Berry
SALACBERRY.description: If held by a Pokémon, it raises its Speed by two steps in a pinch.

PETAYABERRY.name: Petaya Berry
PETAYABERRY.description: If held by a Pokémon, it raises its Sp. Atk by two steps in a pinch.

APICOTBERRY.name: Apicot Berry
APICOTBERRY.description: If held by a Pokémon, it raises its Sp. Def by two steps in a pinch.

LANSATBERRY.name: Lansat Berry
LANSATBERRY.description: If held by a Pokémon, it raises its critical-hit ratio in a pinch.

STARFBERRY.name: Starf Berry
STARFBERRY.description: If held by a Pokémon, it raises one of its stats by three steps in a pinch.

ENIGMABERRY.name: Enigma Berry
ENIGMABERRY.description: If held by a Pokémon, it restores its HP if it is hit by any supereffective attack.

MICLEBERRY.name: Micle Berry
MICLEBERRY.description: If held by a Pokémon, it raises its Accuracy by four steps in a pinch.

CUSTAPBERRY.name: Custap Berry
CUSTAPBERRY.description: If held by a Pokémon, it gets to move first just once in a pinch.

JABOCABERRY.name: Jaboca Berry
JABOCABERRY.description: If held by a Pokémon and a physical attack hits it, the attacker takes 25% HP damage.

ROWAPBERRY.name: Rowap Berry
ROWAPBERRY.description: If held by a Pokémon and a special attack hits it, the attacker takes 25% HP damage.

KEEBERRY.name: Kee Berry
KEEBERRY.description: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will increase the holder's Defense by four steps if it's hit with a physical move.

MARANGABERRY.name: Maranga Berry
MARANGABERRY.description: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will increase the holder's Sp. Def by four steps if it's hit with a special move.

BICYCLE.name: Bicycle
BICYCLE.description: A folding Bicycle that enables much faster movement than the Running Shoes.

TOWNMAP.name: Region Map
TOWNMAP.description: A very convenient map that can be viewed anytime. It even shows your present location.

GRACIDEA.name: Gracidea
GRACIDEA.description: A flower that conveys gratitude. Use it to transform Shaymin into or out of Sky form.

DNASPLICERS.name: DNA Splicers
DNASPLICERS.description: A splicer that fuses Kyurem and a certain Pokémon. They are said to have been one in the beginning.

REVEALGLASS.name: Reveal Glass
REVEALGLASS.description: A glass that reveals the truth. It is a mysterious glass that returns a Pokémon back to its original shape.

SHINYCHARM.name: Shiny Charm
SHINYCHARM.description: A shiny charm which doubles the chance of finding a Shiny Pokémon.

SWEETTOOTH.name: Sweet Tooth
SWEETTOOTH.description: A charm in the shape of a tooth. It increases the EXP. gained from EXP Candy by 15%.

SOOTHECHARM.name: Soothe Charm
SOOTHECHARM.description: A comforting charm which doubles the happiness your Pokémon gain from being close to you.

REDORB.name: Red Orb
REDORB.description: A shiny red orb that is said to have a legend tied to it. It's known to be connected with the Hoenn region.

BLUEORB.name: Blue Orb
BLUEORB.description: A shiny blue orb that is said to have a legend tied to it. It's known to be connected with the Hoenn region.

LUMIOSEGALETTE.name: Lumiose Galette
LUMIOSEGALETTE.description: A popular treat in Lumiose City. It can be used once to heal all the status conditions of a Pokémon.

SHALOURSABLE.name: Shalour Sable
SHALOURSABLE.description: Shalour City's famous shortbread. It can be used once to heal all the status conditions of a Pokémon.

BIGMALASADA.name: Big Malasada
BIGMALASADA.description: The Alola region's specialty--fried bread. It can be used once to heal all the status conditions of a Pokémon.

ABILITYCAPSULE.name: Ability Capsule
ABILITYCAPSULE.description: A capsule that allows a Pokémon with two Abilities to switch between these Abilities when it is used.

SPRINKLOTAD.name: Sprinklotad
SPRINKLOTAD.description: A watering can shaped like a Lotad. It helps promote the healthy growth of any Berries planted in soft soil.

PRISONBOTTLE.name: Prison Bottle
PRISONBOTTLE.description: A bottle believed to have been used to seal away the power of a certain Pokémon long, long ago.

NSOLARIZER.name: N-Solarizer
NSOLARIZER.description: A machine to fuse Necrozma, which needs light, and Solgaleo.

NLUNARIZER.name: N-Lunarizer
NLUNARIZER.description: A machine to fuse Necrozma, which needs light, and Lunala.

MEGARING.name: Mega Ring
MEGARING.description: This ring contains an untold power that somehow enables Pokémon carrying Mega Stones to Mega Evolve.

ZYGARDECUBE.name: Zygarde Cube
ZYGARDECUBE.description: An item holding Zygarde's Cores and Cells. You can use it to change Zygarde's ability.

EXPCANDYXS.name: Exp. Candy XS
EXPCANDYXS.description: A candy that is packed with energy. When consumed, it will grant a single Pokémon 250 Exp. Points.

EXPCANDYS.name: Exp. Candy S
EXPCANDYS.description: A candy that is packed with energy. When consumed, it will grant a single Pokémon 1000 Exp. Points.

EXPCANDYM.name: Exp. Candy M
EXPCANDYM.description: A candy that is packed with energy. When consumed, it will grant a single Pokémon 4,000 Exp. Points.

EXPCANDYL.name: Exp. Candy L
EXPCANDYL.description: A candy that is packed with energy. When consumed, it will grant a single Pokémon 16,000 Exp. Points.

EXPCANDYXL.name: Exp. Candy XL
EXPCANDYXL.description: A candy that is packed with energy. When consumed, it will grant a single Pokémon 64,000 Exp. Points.

FOSSILIZEDBIRD.name: Fossilized Bird
FOSSILIZEDBIRD.description: The fossil of an ancient Pokémon that once soared through the sky. What it looked like is a mystery.

FOSSILIZEDFISH.name: Fossilized Fish
FOSSILIZEDFISH.description: The fossil of an ancient Pokémon that once lived in the sea. What it looked like is a mystery.

FOSSILIZEDDRAKE.name: Fossilized Drake
FOSSILIZEDDRAKE.description: The fossil of an ancient Pokémon that once roamed the land. What it looked like is a mystery.

FOSSILIZEDDINO.name: Fossilized Dino
FOSSILIZEDDINO.description: The fossil of an ancient Pokémon that once lived in the sea. What it looked like is a mystery.

RUSTEDSHIELD.name: Rusted Shield
RUSTEDSHIELD.description: It is said that a hero used this shield to halt a terrible disaster in ancient times. But it's grown rusty and worn.

RUSTEDSWORD.name: Rusted Sword
RUSTEDSWORD.description: It is said that a hero used this sword to halt a terrible disaster in ancient times. But it's grown rusty and worn.

REINSOFUNITY.name: Reins of Unity
REINSOFUNITY.description: Reins that people presented to the king. They enable Calyrex to connect and communicate with its beloved steed.

EXPCHARM.name: EXP Charm
EXPCHARM.description: A charm that increases the Exp. Points that Pokémon can get by 10%. A machine-like object is inside the charm.

CATCHINGCHARM.name: Catching Charm
CATCHINGCHARM.description: A charm that doubles the chance of getting a critical catch.

INFINITEROPE.name: Escape Rope
INFINITEROPE.description: A long, durable rope. Use it to escape instantly from a cave or a dungeon.

GRASSTOKEN.name: Grass Token
GRASSTOKEN.description: A token which can be exchanged for a Grass-type at the Starter Store.

WATERTOKEN.name: Water Token
WATERTOKEN.description: A token which can be exchanged for a Water-type at the Starter Store.

ORIGINORE.name: Origin Ore
ORIGINORE.description: A peculiar ore that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. Associated with Arceus.

FIRETOKEN.name: Fire Token
FIRETOKEN.description: A token which can be exchanged for a Fire-type at the Starter Store.

DRATINIEGG.name: Dratini Egg
DRATINIEGG.description: An abandoned Dratini egg that is cold and calm. Only an expert would be able to hatch it.

BAGONEGG.name: Bagon Egg
BAGONEGG.description: An abandoned Bagon egg that is cold and calm. Only an expert would be able to hatch it.

GIBLEEGG.name: Gible Egg
GIBLEEGG.description: An abandoned Gible egg that is cold and calm. Only an expert would be able to hatch it.

DEINOEGG.name: Deino Egg
DEINOEGG.description: An abandoned Deino egg that is cold and calm. Only an expert would be able to hatch it.

GOOMYEGG.name: Goomy Egg
GOOMYEGG.description: An abandoned Goomy egg that is cold and calm. Only an expert would be able to hatch it.

JANGMOOEGG.name: Jangmo-o Egg
JANGMOOEGG.description: An abandoned Jangmo-o egg that is cold and calm. Only an expert would be able to hatch it.

DREEPYEGG.name: Dreepy Egg
DREEPYEGG.description: An abandoned Dreepy egg that is cold and calm. Only an expert would be able to hatch it.

EEVEETICKET.name: Eevee Ticket
EEVEETICKET.description: A ticket that can be exchanged for an Eevee at the Skeevy Eevee Pub.

AIDKIT.name: Aid Kit
AIDKIT.description: Heals your whole team a limited number of times. Restocked at PokeCenters and after resting.

KITEXPANSION.name: Kit Expansion
KITEXPANSION.description: A pack for holding medicine. If you use it, your Aid Kit will gain a max charge.

MEDICALUPGRADE.name: Medical Upgrade
MEDICALUPGRADE.description: A suite of medicines. If you use it, your Aid Kit will heal more efficiently.

DYNAMITESTICK.name: Dynamite Stick
DYNAMITESTICK.description: A stick of dynamite, perfectly suited to destroying small bits of rock.

FIGMENT.name: Figment
FIGMENT.description: A wisp of ideas with infinite potential. Use it on a Pokémon to teach any one of their legal moves.

SACCHARITEPICK.name: Saccharite Pick
SACCHARITEPICK.description: A food grade mining tool. Allows you to extract EXP. Candy from saccharite deposits.

SURFBOARD.name: Surf Board
SURFBOARD.description: A surf board, allowing you to surf on water.

CHASMIDCARD.name: Chasm ID Card
CHASMIDCARD.description: An ID card which unlocks Team Chasm gates and doors, giving access to dangers and rewards.

CLIMBINGGEAR.name: Climbing Gear
CLIMBINGGEAR.description: A set of climbing gear, allowing you to climb on white rocks.

FLORASCEPTRE.name: Flora Sceptre
FLORASCEPTRE.description: An ancient kingly rod. You can use it to make certain plants grow.

ABRAPORTER.name: Abraporter
ABRAPORTER.description: A teleporter which brings you to your last safe spot using the power of Abras.

REMATERIALIZER.name: Rematerializer
REMATERIALIZER.description: A 3D printer which automatically copies consumed held items after battles.

EXPEZDISPENSER.name: EXP-EZ Dispenser
EXPEZDISPENSER.description: A machine that stores excess EXP. You can activate it to turn that stored EXP into candies.

UNIVERSALFORMALIZER.name: Universal Formalizer
UNIVERSALFORMALIZER.description: Use on a Pokémon to switch it into another one of its forms.

SPANNINGBAND.name: Spanning Bands
SPANNINGBAND.description: An ancient pair of interlocking ceramic rings. Unlocks the ability to teleport between Avatar Totems.

POCKETTOTEM.name: Pocket Totem
POCKETTOTEM.description: A miniature Avatar Totem. Use it to teleport to any unlocked Avatar Totems throughout Makya.

BOXLINK.name: Box Link
BOXLINK.description: An advanced transporter which allows you to access your Pokémon Storage to withdraw or deposit Pokémon.

STYLINGKIT.name: Styling Kit
STYLINGKIT.description: A suite of training tools which allows you to modify your Pokémon's style points.

TAROTAMULET.name: Tarot Amulet
TAROTAMULET.description: If reversed, gym leaders and story fights will become harder through unique curses.

NOISEMACHINE.name: Noise Machine
NOISEMACHINE.description: A small, versatile machine that can be used to repel wild Pokémon, or draw them near.

POKEXRAY.name: Poké X-Ray
POKEXRAY.description: A high tech surveillance device. Use it to scout out the teams of nearby trainers.

CELLBOOSTER.name: Cell Booster
CELLBOOSTER.description: Condensed essence of life. Holding it allows you to run, bike, and surf faster.

RUSTEDCOMPASS.name: Rusted Compass
RUSTEDCOMPASS.description: A small compass. Relic of a heroic age. It can be used to find lootable items nearby.

MAGNETICGAUNTLET.name: Magnetic Gauntlet
MAGNETICGAUNTLET.description: An electrified glove with a claw-like shape. Recovers the first failed Poké Ball thrown in a wild battle.

CHROMACLARION.name: Chroma Clarion
CHROMACLARION.description: An ancient horn. Sound it to start a 3v3 wild battle. Foes will be higher level and likely to have rare moves.

HOUSEDEED1.name: House Deed
HOUSEDEED1.description: Proof of ownership for the house you bought in Prizca East.

GLEAMPOWDER.name: Gleam Powder
GLEAMPOWDER.description: A small vial of gleaming powder. Can be used once to ensure the next wild Pokémon you find is shiny.

VIRALHELIX.name: Viral Helix
VIRALHELIX.description: Infinitely mutating alien DNA. It allows a Pokémon with two abilities to switch abilities when used.

BALLLAUNCHER.name: Ball Launcher
BALLLAUNCHER.description: A device which creates then launches regular Poké Balls, never running out.

PERFORMANCEANALYZER.name: Performance Analyzer
PERFORMANCEANALYZER.description: A hi-tech recording device which creates a Battle Report by analyzing the results of momentous battles.

PERFORMANCEANALYZER2.name: Performance Analyzer 2
PERFORMANCEANALYZER2.description: An upgraded, hi-tech recording device. It increases experience earned from battles by 10%.

BATTLEREPORT.name: Battle Report
BATTLEREPORT.description: A detailed report on how to improve as a trainer. If you decide to read it, your level cap will be raised by 5.

MILKBONETREAT.name: Milk Bone Treat
MILKBONETREAT.description: It would be a delicious treat if you were a Pokémon.

PRIMALCLAY.name: Primal Clay
PRIMALCLAY.description: A lump of ancient clay. It glows with a soft golden color.

OMNIDRIVE.name: OmniDrive
OMNIDRIVE.description: A mysterious data storage device. Plug it into any PC to unlock The Omnitutor.

ANCIENTSEAWATER.name: Ancient Sea Water
ANCIENTSEAWATER.description: A vial of shimmering ocean water. It makes a certain Pokémon evolve.

CUPOFCOFFEE.name: Cup of Coffee
CUPOFCOFFEE.description: It's a cup filled with warm coffee. You probably shouldn't be keeping this in your backpack.

LUXTECHSHIPMENT.name: LuxTech Shipment
LUXTECHSHIPMENT.description: A package containing an important shipment destined for LuxTech.

WEIRDPACKAGE.name: Weird Package
WEIRDPACKAGE.description: A suspicious package. Probably best not to look inside.

AEGISIDCARD.name: Aegis ID Card
AEGISIDCARD.description: A forged ID card. It will let you pretend you work at Aegis Insurance.

INCRIMINATINGEVIDENCE.name: Incriminating Evidence
INCRIMINATINGEVIDENCE.description: A device containing evidence against Aegis Insurance.

DIGITSLIP.name: Digit Slip
DIGITSLIP.description: A slip of paper with one digit of the code for the lock to Rafael's gym door.

SIGILLEFTHALF.name: Sigil Left Half
SIGILLEFTHALF.description: The left half of the sigil of an ancient order of knights.

SIGILRIGHTHALF.name: Sigil Right Half
SIGILRIGHTHALF.description: The right half of the sigil of an ancient order of knights.

CARNATIONSIGIL.name: Carnation Sigil
CARNATIONSIGIL.description: An ancient sigil of the Carnation Knights. You feel it pulling you towards another place.

CONDENSEDLIGHT.name: Condensed Light
CONDENSEDLIGHT.description: A strange ball of light. You should gather these for a friend.

CHAMBER1KEY.name: Chamber 1 Key
CHAMBER1KEY.description: The key to the first chamber containing a powerful avatar.

CHAMBER2KEY.name: Chamber 2 Key
CHAMBER2KEY.description: The key to the second chamber containing a powerful avatar.

CHAMBER3KEY.name: Chamber 3 Key
CHAMBER3KEY.description: The key to the third chamber containing a powerful avatar.

CHAMBER4KEY.name: Chamber 4 Key
CHAMBER4KEY.description: The key to the fourth chamber containing a powerful avatar.

CHAMBER5KEY.name: Chamber 5 Key
CHAMBER5KEY.description: The key to the fifth chamber containing a powerful avatar.

CHAMBER6KEY.name: Chamber 6 Key
CHAMBER6KEY.description: The key to the sixth chamber containing a powerful avatar.

CHAMBER7KEY.name: Chamber 7 Key
CHAMBER7KEY.description: The key to the seventh chamber containing a powerful avatar.

CHAMBER8KEY.name: Chamber 8 Key
CHAMBER8KEY.description: The key to the eighth chamber containing a powerful avatar.

UBCONTAINMENTKEY.name: UB Containment Key
UBCONTAINMENTKEY.description: A key which unlocks the Ultra Beast Containment Room at Novo College.

FACTORYPASS.name: Factory Pass
FACTORYPASS.description: A pass that grants you access through the locked door in Victoire's factory.

RUINEDTOWERKEY.name: Ruined Tower Key
RUINEDTOWERKEY.description: A key which unlocks the ruined tower on the Sandstone Estuary coastline.

LATENTSEED.name: Latent Seed
LATENTSEED.description: A simple tree seed. It hums with the potential for great change.

ALLOYEDLUMP.name: Alloyed Lump
ALLOYEDLUMP.description: Misshapen, unusual metal. Useless without a way to sharpen it.

ALLOYEDBLADE.name: Alloyed Blade
ALLOYEDBLADE.description: A fragile blade of unusual metal. Sharp enough to cut alloyed overgrowth.

ALLOYEDWIRE.name: Alloyed Wire
ALLOYEDWIRE.description: A thin, nearly invisible strand of unusual metal.

SPACETIMESHARD.name: Space-time Shard
SPACETIMESHARD.description: A sliver of the fragment of the universe. Highly unstable.

OLDUSBDRIVE.name: Old USB Drive
OLDUSBDRIVE.description: A USB containing data from a Team Chasm's early days.

GILDEDAPRICORN.name: Gilded Apricorn
GILDEDAPRICORN.description: A gleaming golden fruit. Someone skilled may be able to craft it into a unique Poké Ball.

RAGGEDJOURNAL.name: Ragged Journal
RAGGEDJOURNAL.description: A damaged traveler's journal. If you find its scattered pages, you can put them back in place.

DEADSKYSLIVER.name: Dead Sky Sliver
DEADSKYSLIVER.description: A dark sliver of something that hurts to look at. It bears an inscription.

TIMELOSTALABASTER.name: Timelost Alabaster
TIMELOSTALABASTER.description: Inscribed, delicate pale stone. It’s always been here, but it hasn’t always always been here.

WRETCHEDWHITEWING.name: Wretched Whitewing
WRETCHEDWHITEWING.description: A radiant wing. It radiates misery, but you feel peaceful holding it. Returning home, returning home...

VIPCARD.name: VIP Card
VIPCARD.description: A glamorous steel card. While holding it, all vendors cost 10% less and Pokécenter Marts have extra items.

OMINOUSEGG.name: Ominous Egg
OMINOUSEGG.description: A vessel for negative emotions. Perfectly defeat enough trainers to earn its rewards.
